code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function MenuPage(props){var menuItems=props.menuItems;var handleAddToCart=function handleAddToCart(itemID){return fetch("/api/carts/".concat(itemID),{method:'PUT',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({})}).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(data){console.log(data);}).catch(function(error){console.error(error);});};var handleRemoveFromCart=function handleRemoveFromCart(itemID){return fetch("/api/carts/".concat(itemID,"/decrease"),{method:'PUT',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({subtract:true})}).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(data){console.log(data);}).catch(function(error){console.error(error);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"menu-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Let's see our menu!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"menu",children:menuItems.map(function(item){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"menu-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.image,alt:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:item.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Price: $",item.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button-one",id:"button-".concat(item.id),onClick:function onClick(){return handleAddToCart(item.id);},children:"Add"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button-one",id:"remove-".concat(item.id),onClick:function onClick(){return handleRemoveFromCart(item.id);},children:"Remove"})]},item.id);})})]});}export default MenuPage;
